There are three types of users inside of: There are three types of users inside of GlobaLeaks: the administrator, the receivers and the whistleblower. Your username for accessing the node as the administrator will be 'admin'.
These are the thresholds that are used t: These are the thresholds that are used to identify anomalous behaviour:
They would like you to pay special atten: They would like you to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks for the public interest. Therefore the material that they provide with this tip-off should be considered of high importance.

This interface may help you spot anomali: This interface may help you spot anomalies with your Node.
This interface may help you understand h: This interface may help you understand how the Node can be configured and provides some info on how to connect to other GlobaLeaks users and experts.

This interface may help you understand how the Node is used by the whistleblower. It displays the submissions currently on the node and a few statistics on the kind of usage (activity, files, comments).
This interface permits to configure the: This interface permits to configure the email templates used for secure mail notifications.

To ensure your anonymity be sure that yo:
To ensure your anonymity be sure that you are visiting this site using the Tor Browser Bundle.
You acknowledge that failure to do so will result in the inability to technically protect your anonymity.
To further enhance your security, please follow these instructions:
1) In the event that you would like to remain anonymous, do not submit any personal information. (e.g. your name or relationship to the offender. Do not submit any information that can be traced back to you.)
2) Please do not submit your report on a PC provided by your employer. Particularly an intranet connection may jeopardize your anonymity.

Which of the following statements is tru: Which of the following statements is true?
Whistleblowers can perform submissions v: Whistleblowers can perform submissions via Tor2web.
With a HTTPS submission you are exposing:
With a HTTPS submission you are exposing yourself to the risks that someone else will know that you have submitted something, without knowing what you have submitted.

Instead with an Anonymous Submission you are fully protected, it is not possible for a third party to know that you have submitted something nor what you have submitted.

We strongly advise you to go for an Anonymous Submission.

To make an Anonymous Submission, instead of using your usual Web Browser (Internet Explorer, Chrome, Firefox, Opera, etc.) you should use the Tor Browser Bundle. This is a special piece of software designed to enable Anonymous Web Browsing.
Without a valid PGP key, the system will: Without a valid PGP key, the system will not be able to send you encrypted notifications.
You are aware of the risks involved. Go: You are aware of the risks involved. Go ahead, but consider yourself warned.
You are connecting to the node without a: You are connecting to the node without anonymity and this node supports only anonymous submissions
You are receiving this email because you: You are receiving this email because you should look into this to determine if the cause is malicious or not.
You are strongly advised to visit this s: You are strongly advised to visit this site using the desktop app called Tor Browser, that protects your identity.
You are strongly suggested to use the To: You are strongly suggested to use the Tor Browser, unless you know what you are doing.
